mapper.select: SELECT l.user_id AS userId, l.song_id AS songId, s.title AS title, s.singer AS singer, s.song_no AS songNo, s.brand AS brand FROM likes l JOIN song s ON l.song_id = s.id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND l.song_id > #{offset} ORDER BY l.song_id ASC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND song_id = #{songId}
